thread.title: BMW M2 Coupe to Make Video Game Debut in Need For Speed
thread.title_full: BMW M2 Coupe to Make Video Game Debut in Need For Speed

author: Steve_OS
title: BMW M2 Coupe to Make Video Game Debut in Need For Speed
text: BMW M2 Coupe to Make Video Game Debut in Need For Speed 03:42 PM - October 14, 2015 by Steve_OS The recently announced BMW M2 Coupe will make its video game debut in Need For Speed, when it launches for Xbox One and PlayStation 4 on November 3. Check out the trailer here . Quote: The BMW M2 Coupe represents the successor of the historical BMW 1 Series M Coupe. With its 6-cylinder engine and rear-wheel drive, the BMW M2 Coupe sets new benchmarks in terms of driving dynamics and agility. Moreover, the consistent use of iconic M design elements contributes to its expressive design and authentic M appearance. With an engine output of 272 kW (370 hp) and a maximum torque of 500 Nm, this car is a power pack, letting you know the true promise of ultimate driving pleasure! For more news, media and information on Need For Speed, check out this page .
